title: Bran Black - Business Council of Australia
snippet: Bran Black was appointed Chief Executive of the Business Council of Australia in September 2023.

title: Ministerial Advisory Board | Jobs and Skills Australia
snippet: She was appointed as a director of Industry Fund Services in 2022, having served as CEO from 2016. Bran Black commenced as the Chief Executive of the Business Council of Australia in September 2023.

title: Bran Black: Meet the new CEO of the Business Council of Australia
snippet: As the pick to succeed Jennifer Westacott as the head of the Business Council of Australia, congenial political staffer and former lawyer Bran Black lacked instant name recognition.
